thread.title: Beyoncé Cancels Coachella Performances ‘Following the Advice of Her Doctors’
thread.title_full: Beyoncé Cancels Coachella Performances ‘Following the Advice of Her Doctors’

author: BEN SISARIO
title: Beyoncé Cancels Coachella Performances ‘Following the Advice of Her Doctors’
text: Continue reading the main story Photo Beyoncé at the Grammy Awards this month. Credit Matt Sayles/Invision, via Matt Sayles, via Invision, via Associated Press The Instagram post raised the question. And after the belly-cradling Grammys performance , it sure seemed unlikely. Now Beyoncé, pregnant with twins, has confirmed it: She will not play Coachella this year, after all. In a statement, Beyoncé’s company, Parkwood Entertainment, and Goldenvoice, the promoter behind the festival, confirmed that Beyoncé has pulled out of the event, over two weekends in April, “following the advice of her doctors to keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months,” the statement said, according to The Associated Press .
